resources.string: Something went wrong. Please try again.
Simple application that grabs content from the web \"https://www.compass.com/about/\" and defines and runs 2 requests simultaneously:
Find every 10th character (i.e. 10th, 20th, 30th, etc.) and display the array on the screen.

Split the text into words using whitespace characters (i.e. space, tab, line break, etc.), count the occurrence of every unique word (case insensitive) and display the count for each word on the screen.
(In order to make it more readable we are getting the very first \"main\" container from the web content and splitting the entire string into de first 1000 characters)
